buginformation.summary: Abbruch der Baulastbescheinigung bei gel√∂schten Baulasten.
buginformation.description: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/899
`abgrechnungsdatum` => `abrechnungsdatum`
NPE in FeatureRenderer for new objects with no "Zaehlungen" reported at: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/388

Sometimes it can happen, that the vm crashes during the initialisation of the StadtbildAggregationrRenderer. This behaviour is only reproducable under certain circumstances. The log file of the vm crash indicates, that the Imaging Loading thread, especially loading the Image with ImageIo is the cause of the crash. To avoid this, the apache commons-imaging project should be used instead of ImageIo see also https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/637

When trying to download AlkisDownload product from the billing renderer table, a StringIndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown, if the AlkisProduct was configured with a custom scale. The reason for this is, that the url contains an empty parameter in fact the url contains "&&". When trying to find the "=" for that paramter the excpetion is thrown Thus we need to check if the index of '=' is not -1. If so we skip this paramter. see also: https://github.com/cismet/cids-custom-wuppertal-server/issues/84 ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1785245/4976411/b6ec0822-68e3-11e4-9c2a-f1dac9a96f60.png)

buginformation.summary: Statdbildaggregationrenderer vorschau bild is shown twice
buginformation.description: #286 forces the first picture to be the vorschau bild of the stadtbildserie. If the vosrchaubild is not the first picture the vorschaubild is shown twice, on the first index and the original index of the vorschaubild. When fetching the bildnummer of the index of the vorschau bild, the first blattnummer must be returned
Hence the VermessungrissEditor uses static GUI components, a deadlock can occur. Thus those static GUI components needs to be removed
